title: Major Index on Catalan Combinatorics
abstract:
We study the two statistics, the inversion number and the major index, on
Catalan combinatorial objects such as $r$-Dyck paths, $r$-Stirling
permutations, non-crossing partitions, Dyck tilings, and symmetric Dyck paths.
We show that they are equidistributed with the inversion number or the major
index on Dyck paths.
